Dukes Wines By Body

This is a rundown of the Winelist for Duke's Beachhouse Maui. It's a work-in-progress so please be forgiving!

View On GitHub

    Dukes Wines By Body

    Wines by body from Lightest-Bodied to Fullest. Tasting body is similar to tasting the difference between skim to whole milk (and all the percentages in between).
